headline: Royal Caribbean Cruises (RCL) Valuation Check After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: Royal Caribbean Cruises: Recent Returns and Current Scale Royal Caribbean Cruises (RCL) has drawn attention after a one-month return of about an 8% decline and a past three-month return near a 15% decline, despite a trailing one-year total return above 12%. The company operates 67 ships across several cruise brands, reports annual revenue of about US$17.4 billion and net income of roughly US$4.1 billion, and recently closed at US$270.01 per share. See our latest analysis for Royal Caribbean...
